Module kivakit.data.compression
Package com.telenav.kivakit.data.compression.codecs.huffman.list

Class HuffmanStringListCodec

java.lang.Object
com.telenav.kivakit.data.compression.codecs.huffman.list.HuffmanStringListCodec
All Implemented Interfaces:
Codec<String>, StringCodec, StringListCodec
public class HuffmanStringListCodec extends Object implements StringListCodec
Compression and decompression of lists of strings using a StringCodec and a CharacterCodec. The method encode(ByteList, SymbolProducer) receives a sequence of strings produced by the SymbolProducer interface. If the string codec cannot be used to compress the entire string at once, the character codec will be used. When the decode(ByteList, SymbolConsumer) method is called, this codec will send the same strings in the same order to the SymbolConsumer consumer.
Author:
jonathanl (shibo)
See Also:
HuffmanCodec, StringCodec, CharacterCodec, ByteList, SymbolProducer, SymbolConsumer
